address.1: Haile G/Silassie Road, ADDIS ABABA, ETHIOIA

welcome.1: Welcome to Ethiopian Urban Water Federation
welcome.2: The Ethiopian Water Federation (EWF) was established on April 13, 2018 and registered as a legal entity by the Ministry of Water and Energy under the authority granted to it by Article 8(1) (A) of Proclamation Number 197/1992 of the Ethiopian Law
welcome.3: The Federation's mandate is to provide a platform for all Ethiopia utilities to advocate for issues relating to their development and sustainability, as well as capacity building and support for utilities.

vision.3: To become the first and competent association in east Africa by providing support for water supply and Sanitation Utilities through capacity building and provide training on new technologies that will lead Water utilities for an outstanding performance.

objectives.2: Enhance the capacity of the EWF.
objectives.3: Ensure the financial sustainability of the Ethiopian Water Federation.
objectives.4: Promote members’ interests and create opportunities for their development.

donating.1: We’re here to support poor people
donating.4: you care about Start donating them
